snippet.title: All Is Dust Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=419132957  Vote for us on Greenlight Please!

It’s the year 1928, and Oklahoma has been brought to it’s knees by the Dust Bowl.  But the suffocating dust is the least of your problems...

In this brand new horror game for PC and Oculus Rift, take on the role of Thomas Joad, a proud farmer and father.  Over the course of three nights he tries to unravel the mysterious and horrific events that are plaguing his once beautiful land.  


Explore the dried up farm to find clues to what’s going on.  Evade and outsmart the dangers of the field.  Unravel the events leading up to these horrific nights.  Try to come to terms with your fragile existence.

All Is Dust.
---------------------------------------

Explorative gameplay interspersed with terror and panic.
Oculus Rift compatible for the most immersive horror.
Hand-drawn cutscenes.
Eerie 1930s themed music and SFX.
Totally free!  No DLC or nothing!
